title: No Fee - Stunning 1250sf Gallery Loft - Doorman/Garage/Gym/Roof Deck
neighborhood: Clinton Hill/Brooklyn Navy Yard (Manhattan direct NYC Ferry
posting_body: ['No Fee + Fully renovated - Sprawling and unique 1250sf Gallery Loft.', 'Unit has great options for different living plans.', 'Very versatile!', 'Available for 8/8 move in.', 'The Guarantors and Rhino accepted.', 'I live in the building so feel free to call with any questions or for a virtual building tour!', 'Photos may be of similar units, please see floor plan.', 'In the building:-', '- Newly renovated attended lobby', '- New entry with phone connected intercom system', '- Package room', '- Furnished roof deck with stunning Manhattan view', '- Fitness Center with Peloton', '- Elevators', '- Indoor garage parking for cars, SUVs, motorcycles and bicycles', '- Storage', '-10,000sf Spa and Wet Lounge', '-Le Petit Monstre French Bakery and Grocery', '- Brooklyn Creative League Workspace', 'On the block:', '- Brooklyn Roasting Company', '- 121 Fitness', '- Recess Art Gallery', '- Il Porto Wood Oven Pizza and Restaurant', '- Grapeshot Wine Boutique', '- Burger Ur Way-Greenway Salads', 'Ideal for commuters, 275 Park Avenue is located by the Manhattan direct NYC Ferry at the Brooklyn Navy Yard which allows a fast 10-minute ride to Wall Street and 12-minute ride to Midtown.', 'There is also a Citi Bike station with 45 docks located right outside as well as easy access to the Clinton/Washington G subway line, York Street F subway line and Jay Street/Metrotech A,C,F and R trains, as well as the B62, B57 and B69 bus lines.', 'Located directly between Williamsburg and Dumbo and close to Fort Greene Park, Brooklyn Bridge Park, Pratt Institute in the heart of the Tech Triangle.', 'Photos are of an identical unit with slightly lower ceiling on a higher floor.', 'Please see floor plan']
